air rage.translation[0].definitions[0].d: violence and angry behaviour by a passenger on a plane towards other passengers or the people who work on it
air rage.translation[1].definitions[0].d: violent and angry behaviour by air passengers towards AIRLINE employees
air rage.translation[1].definitions[0].e: In another air rage incident, a flight to Spain was forced to land after a passenger threatened cabin staff when they refused to serve him more alcohol.
